author: Ben Otto
title: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Alleged Islamic State Terror Leader
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesia—Following a week of deadly attacks that raised fears of a worsening terrorist threat, Indonesian prosecutors pushed Friday for stronger action against those whipping up extremist ideas—including the death penalty.
Prosecutors said they are seeking capital punishment for Aman Abdurrahman, an Islamist cleric they say incited followers to take up arms against civilian targets in the world’s most populous Muslim-majority nation.
...
